means: 仪式，典礼( rite的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Father Stephen Lea administered the last rites to the dead men.
sentence.Network_cn: 史蒂芬·利神父为死者主持了临终圣礼。

sentence.Network_en: to administer the last rites to sb
He is interested in mystic rites and ceremonies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对神秘的仪式感兴趣.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the unity of the church is not in external rites ., 团结教会不是在外部礼记.
... : of or having the nature of，or done as a rite orrites仪式的，典礼的--------------------------------------------------.
the General somehow obtained a coffin and lent every assistance toward last rites .我们的将军设法搞到一口棺材，并且为最后的告别仪式给与了一切必要的帮助。
rites 丧祭之礼, rites 礼制, rites 意境的再现

list.abs: 英语单词立体记忆 ... the Japanese tea ceremony 日本茶道 funeral rites 葬礼 → monitor 班长，监视器.
《双狙人》_互动百科 ... 大联盟 Major League 1989 最后的仪式（last rites） Last Rites 1988 大反叛 Betrayed 1988.
首页-老鞋匠外贸-- 淘宝网 ... Jack Wolfskin/ 狼爪 stride rite 新泰莱 reebok 锐步.
社会工作专业英语词汇(P6) ... puberty growth spurt 青春期快速生长青春期快速生长 puberty rite 成年礼 pubescence 青春期.

entry.def: A rite is a traditional ceremony that is carried out by a particular group or within a particular society.

example.ex: Most traditional societies have transition rites at puberty.
example.tran: 大多数传统社会都为青春期的孩子举行成人礼。
